alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:43PM CDT until April 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... East central Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 542 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Oklahoma City, or near The Fairgrounds, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail in Mustang. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, southwestern Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, Bethany, Mustang, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, Lake Aluma, and Smith Village. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
